post:
We are now providing cheapest Windows VPS servers with both 2003 and 2008 in Web, Standard and Enterprise Edition. All Windows VPS servers come with remote desktop (RDP) enabled. These are hosted on enterprise grade multi-core Hardware with a minimum of 32/16GB RAM with raid-10 protected storage and offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee. Windows VPS servers are available in both USA & UK DC's. You can choose to have MSSQL 2008 and WebsitePanel pre-installed on order form.

We Accept All major credit cards via paypal, Payza (alertpay), Moneybookers (Skrill) and Liberty Reserve. Users from all countries are accepted. If you have any questions please feel free to submit a sales ticket with our sales department.


We Also Offer Linux VPS Servers, Please Click Here to View Linux VPS Packages


OVERVIEW:

  • Windows 2003 and 2008 (in both 32Bit and 64Bit)
  • MSSQL 2008 with both Win 2003 and Win 2008 (FREE)
  • WebSitePanel Panel with both Win 2003 and Win 2008 (FREE)
  • Remote Desktop (RDP) is Enabled on setup
  • Free Unlimited Manual Reboots
  • Free Unlimited OS Re-installs
  • Free Unlimited Version Changes
  • Free Web Site Panel Control Panel
  • Both Ipv4 and IPv6 Support
  • Full Administrative Access (No Cache)
  • 1-Click Upgrades
  • There are no CONTRACTS

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: How Long does it take to setup a Windows VPS Server?
Ans: On average, less than 6 hours since you ordered your Windows VPS; however we do not take more than 24 hours.

Q: I am looking for Linux VPS plateform instead Windows VPS, do you offer Linux VPS?
Ans: Yes, we do. Please visit our website to check Linux VPS or go directly by CLIKING HERE.

Q: My order keeps getting denied, WHY?
Ans: We have a fraud checking system in place for all orders. To ensure that your order does not get automatically denied by our system, please make sure you enter all client details correctly including name, phone number and area code, and addresses. Our fraud checking system takes into account many factors such as your IP, postal code, hostname and ISP, if you're going through a proxy or not, etc. Certain orders will be checked by automated phone call verification. Highly possible fraudulent orders are declined automatically. If you're having trouble due to this, please contact our sales department directly.

Q: Do you offer 24/7 support?
Ans: Of course we do! We find 24/7 to be absolutely necessary to any online business and it should be a standard for this industry.

Q: What payment methods do you support?
Ans: We currently accept credit card payments via Paypal. We also accept Payza (Alertpay), Moneybookers (Skrill), WebMoney and Liberty Reserve as payment methods/options so that those users can also use our service where paypal is not supported at the moment.
